title: War Z Where is my Survivor
creator: Flip120

reviews.title: Not precision
reviews.comment: Some of my players location are not exactly where they are on this app. I love this game, but so many hackers
reviews.author: Julius Ekaputra

reviews.title: Nice app!
reviews.comment: Love it, It will go nicely with my poster map with player markers I made.
reviews.author: Jason Massey

reviews.title: Good app, could be even more detailed
reviews.comment: Maybe you could make it yo where you can put what the character has on them at that location? Or their health? That would be cool.
reviews.author: Tyler Bostedor

reviews.title: F***ing Usefull!!!
reviews.comment: I was so tired of writing my character\'s location on papers!!! Thx and keep up the good work like this!
reviews.author: C\303\251sar Castillo Mart\303\255nez

reviews.title: Garbage
reviews.comment: So this is soppose to show where ur character is to make it easier so you don\'t have to hop on each one to figure it out. Well whereever u click on the map is where it\'ll say your avatar is. Mine are at the north safe zone, but I pressed the map in diff locations and that\'s where it showed that they are. Garbage app.
reviews.author: Dawid Chelczynski

reviews.title: It works like a charm
reviews.comment: Now I can see where ppl on my server are when I\'m playing lol
reviews.author: Jake Sirico
